data.title: Halfyearly results of Umicore
data.meta_description: Halfyearly results of Umicore - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Student: Anass Hammich 2AT4 Lecturer: Jordi Casteleyn

2. Summary  History  Catalysis  Energy materials  Performance materials  balancesheet

3. History  1805: Jean-Jacques Dony receives the concession for the zincmines of Vieille Montagne  the birth of this company  1906: foundation of Union Minière  purpose: to reclaim the mines of the Belgian-Congo  take-over of Vieille Montagne => Union Minière has risen  1967: all the activities were nationalised by Moboutu to gécamines  1989: all the subsidiaries are incorporated in Union Minière  2001: Union Minière reduces the reclamation changes name  Umicore

4. Catalysis In million € H1 H2 TOTAL H1 H2 TOTAL 2010 2010 2010 2011 2011 2011 Turnover 760,8 787,5 1.548,3 944,1 952,0 1.896,1 Revenues (excl metal) 339,4 359,3 698,7 389,0 424,4 813,3 1,000.0 900.0 800.0 700.0 600.0 500.0 Turnover Revenues (excluding metal) 400.0 300.0 200.0 100.0 0.0 H1 H2 H1 H2 2010 2010 2011 2011
